Headings

I am a Heading Level 1 (H1)

I am a Heading Level 2 (H2)

I am a Heading Level 3 (H3)

I am a Heading Level 4 (H4)

I am a Heading Level 5 (H5)
<h1 class="text-primary">I am a Heading Level 1 (H1)</h1>
<h2>I am a Heading Level 2 (H2)</h2>
<h3 class="text-warning">I am a Heading Level 3 (H3)</h3>
<h4>I am a Heading Level 4 (H4)</h4>
<h5 class="text-muted">I am a Heading Level 5 (H5)</h5>

I am an H1 Using the Cursive Script

I am an H2 Using the Cursive Script

I am an H3 Using the Cursive Script

<h2 class="text-cursive text-primary">I am an H2 Using the Cursive Script</h2>
<h3 class="text-cursive text-primary">I am an H3 Using the Cursive Script</h3>
